title: Is it better to pursue mathematics and computer science or computer science? - Quora

response.answer_text: It Depends where would you work? and what do you want to become ? If you would like to do BSc mathematics you will study algebra, Numerical Analysis, calculus 1,calculus 2 and other subjects up to level 5 Sometimes you have to do PGCE or Master to become Math Teacher. On the other hand , Mathematics and Computer Science will teach you what I mentioned above plus computer science subjects. However, you will focus on discrete mathematics especially logic, Boolean algebra and algorithm. In addition, you will learn networking, introduction to computer history up to current microprocessor, programming, statistics for machine learning, Internet of things, Artificial Intelligence and other topics. In terms of employment, You might work as a programmer, software developer or in rare cases computer teacher.
